data.name: HENTAI MINESWEEPER TRUE
data.detailed_description: In this addition, there are a few more challenging levels with an emphasis on hentai well, at the end of the passing game you will find a surprise that will appreciate the fans of hentai . In General it is pure hentai all you like :)

data.supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Japanese*

  • Processor: Intel Celeron 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
